entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
